A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Severely disappointed with this film. Was all hyped up and ready to watch something good but it left me lost and confused.

So many times I felt frustrated with the plot. It's never good when you ask yourself\, "Why didn't they just do that in the first place?"\,  or\, "Why don't they all just attack?". 

So much of it felt like plot lines from previous Star Wars films\, rehashed into a new version at different points.

Felt like a computer had looked at successful plot lines in previous films and then sewn them together - it lacked soul\, ingenuity\, character. The script left good actors with not much to work with.

Really disappointed.
